title: Autonomous AI Robot for Lunar Exploration
content: I'm excited to share that my project on developing autonomous, self-evolving AI robot systems for lunar exploration has reached a significant milestone.

title: Finalist in National Innovation Contest 2020
content: Honored to be among the top 10 finalists out of 30,000+ submissions in the National Innovation Contest 2020.

title: LIDAR-Based Object Mapping and Identification Rover
content: My LIDAR-based rover project for space debris tracking has been progressing well! More updates coming soon.
